title: Nursing Simulation Education Course via Simple-to-Complex Sequential Learning for [K-12]

context.prior_knowledge: Basic Nursing Theory and Clinical Practice Experience
context.additional_context: Blended learning conducted in smartphone-based, limited-technology environments, featuring hands-on training linked to project-based assessments

learning_goals: Learners enhance clinical reasoning skills through progressive simulations ranging from simple cases (hypertension management) to complex cases (pediatric emergencies)
Learners achieve over 80% mastery in project-based assessments following simulation activities
Learners refine problem-solving strategies through an average of three or more iterative learning cycles during simulation processes

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
